thread.title: Great stay!!
thread.title_full: Great stay!! - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Opera Liege, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: chef276
title: Great stay!!
text: Me and my parntner had a great stay and would recommend staying at this hotel. The breakfast is beautiful and the rooms are great. Staff are very knowledgeable and couldnt fault our service that we were given. Only thing I could say is that the women on the bar on the night of the 15th of February needs to learn how to pour a beer. That's being very petty. But overall a great stay.
